Detailed Description

A graph using a cartesian (X-Y) plot space.

Member Function Documentation

- (id) initWithFrame: (CGRect)  newFrame
xScaleType: (CPScaleType)  newXScaleType
yScaleType: (CPScaleType)  newYScaleType 

Initializes a newly allocated CPXYGraph object with the provided frame rectangle and scale types.

This is the designated initializer.

Parameters:
newFrame The frame rectangle.
newXScaleType The scale type for the x-axis.
newYScaleType The scale type for the y-axis.
Returns:
The initialized CPXYGraph object.
